The unique serial version UID so that the client and server can send and receive Tiles with the same serialization.

setup() - Method in class com.github.moribund.audio.MusicContainer
Sets up the MusicContainer.musicForFile looping through every MusicFile value and using its MusicFile.location field and LibGDX's Audio class to make a new Music instance.
setup() - Method in class com.github.moribund.images.SpriteContainer
Populates the SpriteContainer.spriteForFile, using SpriteContainer.makeSprite(SpriteFile) to make Sprites.

The equivalent of ApplicationListener.create() where this is run as soon as this screen is displayed.
